text.section: A party may apply to the arbitrators to modify or correct an award within 20 days after delivery of the award to the applicant.
A written notice of an application to modify or correct the award shall be given to the opposing party, stating that he shall serve any objection to the application within ten days.

The arbitrators may modify or correct an award:
On the grounds stated in § 3-223(b)(1), (2), or (3) of this subtitle; or
For the purpose of clarity.
The arbitrators shall modify or correct an award consistent with the order of court, if a petition under § 3-223, § 3-224, or § 3-227 of this subtitle is pending.
The modified or corrected award is subject to the provisions of §§ 3-223, 3-224, and 3-227 of this subtitle.
